title: New: Hype Williams – London 2012
body: [**Hype Williams**’](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18410-new-hype-williams-galice/ "New: Hype Williams – Galice") show this weekend, was, well, you’ll have to wait for the review; let’s just say it was the best show I’ve seen all year. We can leave it at that. While you wait, here’s the 20-minute tour CD sold at their Berlin and London shows respectively. If you want to recreate what it was like to be there, buy a smoke machine. That’s all I’m saying.
